org.apache.hadoop.metrics2

类 AbstractMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.AbstractMetric
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MetricsInfo

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public abstract class AbstractMetric
extends Object
implements MetricsInfo
    The immutable metric
